title: FS: T206 Ty Cobb Piedmont 350-460 Trimmed
author: Epps

posts.post_title: FS: T206 Ty Cobb Piedmont 350-460 Trimmed
posts.post_content:
For sale today is a 3-sided trimmed T206 Ty Cobb. Although it is trimmed down to its borders, the card actually looks really good. This one presents nicely and is a great option for a cheap, good looking Cobb. $300 delivered. PM or email me at [url]eppersmatt@yahoo.com[/url] with any questions or offers.

$300 Delivered

Sold
